instruction: Design a product-marketing campaign which communicates its benefits to a given target group.
input: A language-learning app targeted to college students.
output: A product-marketing campaign for a language-learning app targeted to college students could highlight the unique benefit of the app which can be that it enables learning a language in a flexible, on-the-go manner that complements a student's busy college lifestyle. The campaign could emphasize how the app facilitates the process of learning a language because of its mobile accessibility and personalized course plans tailored to suit a student's learning goals and schedule.
